Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add ERP features: auth, inventory management, and warehouse tracking

- Implemented authentication module with login functionality
- Added comprehensive inventory management system with product tracking
- Created warehouse management with detail and list views
- Added feature modules for accounting, HR, sales, purchases, and reports
- Included complete ERP operation documentation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
